author: pharaohh
msg: Changed AuthorizationVote granted and denied fields to 'grant' and 'deny' to be consistent w/ 'abstain' (and since the act of voting is a verb, it made sense)

author: pharaohh
msg: Renamed AuthorizationGranter to Authorizer to be consistent with the naming of Authenticator.  Also checked in the reference implementation's libs and versions.txt file

author: pharaohh
msg: changed the word 'user' to 'account' in javadoc and method names for consistency

author: pharaohh
msg: Updated AnnotationAuthorizationModule to work w/ newer HasPermission annotation and removed generic access to AuthorizationAnnotation since annotation subclassing is not allowed
